hackathon-description-text: MLH Hackathon at the University of Sheffield.
hackathon-eligibility: Team of 1-4 people. Must be at university, or have graduated since 15th October 2015.
hackathon-rules: We use the MLH Code of Conduct:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First place prize awarded for the best hack!
Second place prize awarded for the second place hack!
Third place prize awarded for the third place hack!
A prize for the funniest hack of the weekend!
Best Use of Nessie Financial API
Most Innovative Use of APIs with emphasis on hacks using multiple APIs
Most Innovative Mobile App w/ emphasis on B2B
Best Use of Blackrock's Aladdin API
Best Real-Time Communication with emphasis on video communication

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win HackHarassment Swag Bag.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=32 Leavygreave Rd, Sheffield S3 7QY, UK
hackathon-description-header: MLH Student Hackathon at the University of Sheffield, open to students across the world.
